      • hasEnoughPlayers

        public static boolean hasEnoughPlayers(Clan c,
                                       Tournament t)
        Checks if a clan has enough valid players in it to register for specific tournament Checks : if user has game, if user isn't already registered in tournament (through other clan), if user isn't deactivated in clan.
        Parameters:
        c - Object of type Clan
        t - Object of type Tournament
        Returns:
        Returns true if number of valid players id superior or equal to tournament format id
